title: Oprah and Laila Ali: Your Life in Focus
description: Undefeated world champion boxer, fitness expert, cookbook author and host of OWN’s Home Made Simple, Laila Ali joins WW Presents “Oprah’s 2020 Vision: Your Life in Focus Tour” for a talk in front of a live audience in Charlotte, North Carolina. Laila opens up about her legendary father Muhammad Ali, taking a chance on herself and where her confidence comes from. She discusses creating her own legacy, why she feels heathier now than she did 15 years ago and how she earned her father’s respect. Laila also talks about being a parent, why she believes self-care is a priority and why it’s so important not to let fear hold you back.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
